text: 1.25: Ais 44.20; Jer 13.25; 16.19; Amo 2.4; Ro 9.5; 1 Te 1.9; 1 Zo 5.20Mba khesharigi gumgi gu mbigi, mbe Fhe Bakɨmen buni guari, mbe nta thav, fhura guiguigi buni, mbe nta ndigi. Mbe nta ndigap, za kha bigi ga muuŋgi Fhe Bakɨme, mbe kɨr ana segap, mbe ana muuŋgi bigi, mbe nta rotu mbuav, nta piin ki. Fhe Bakɨme, ana za kha bigi nɨɨŋge ma. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, nza zazera ana zɨ ndiv vun kuamkuarga. Ne guigira.
